name: Cloudbound Journey
description:
In Cloudbound Journey,  you play as a small plane on a relaxing journey to the highest mountain in the world. Fly through breathtaking landscapes of snow-capped mountains and verdant forests on your way to the top of the world.

As you progress through the game, you'll unlock new planes to fly and new locations to visit. Each level offers a unique challenge and a breathtaking view, making Cloudbound Journey a relaxing and enjoyable experience.

Cloudbound Journey is a peaceful and relaxing game that's perfect for winding down after a long day. Whether you're a seasoned pilot or new to flying, you'll find plenty to enjoy in this tranquil and beautiful game. Soar through the clouds and enjoy the serene beauty of Cloudbound Journey.
